description: Alteration to rear roof dormer extension; alteration and enlargement to approved basement excavation (Part Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site location plan; 1258.01 (Pre-existing elevations); 1258.02 (Pre-existing ground and first floor plans); 1258.06C (Approved floor plans); 1258.06E (Existing and approved elevations); 1258.07C (Approved elevations and section); 1258.07E (Proposed elevations); 1258.08C (Proposed plans and elevations); 1258/21.10PB (Existing and proposed basement and ground floor plan); 1258/21.13P (Existing and approved first and second floor plan); 1258/21.14PL (Existing and approved ground floor plans); 1258/21.15PL (Existing and approved first floor plan); 1258/21.10/19 (Proposed section); 1258/21.11/19 (Approved elevations)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
